text: Tonga competed at the 2019 World Aquatics Championships in Gwangju, South Korea from 12 to 28 July. ==Swimming== Tonga entered four swimmers. ;Men {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; font-size:90%" |- !rowspan="2"|Athlete !rowspan="2"|Event !colspan="2"|Heat !colspan="2"|Semifinal !colspan="2"|Final |-style="font-size:95%" !Time !Rank !Time !Rank !Time !Rank |- |align=left rowspan=2|Amini Fonua |align=left|50 m breaststroke |29.73 |56 |colspan=4|Did not advance |- |align=left|100 m breaststroke |1:08.32 |81 |colspan=4|Did not advance |- |align=left rowspan=2|Finau Ohuafi |align=left|50 m freestyle |25.32 |98 |colspan=4|Did not advance |- |align=left|100 m freestyle |57.45 |106 |colspan=4|Did not advance |} ;Women {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; font- size:90%" |- !rowspan="2"|Athlete !rowspan="2"|Event !colspan="2"|Heat !colspan="2"|Semifinal !colspan="2"|Final |-style="font-size:95%" !Time !Rank !Time !Rank !Time !Rank |- |align=left rowspan=2|Noelani Day |align=left|50 m freestyle |28.67 |67 |colspan=4|Did not advance |- |align=left|50 m backstroke |35.17 |43 |colspan=4|Did not advance |- |align=left rowspan=2|Charissa Panuve |align=left|100 m freestyle |1:08.00 |84 |colspan=4|Did not advance |- |align=left|200 m freestyle |2:33.31 |61 |colspan=4|Did not advance |} ;Mixed {|class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; font-size:90%" |- !rowspan=2|Athlete !rowspan=2|Event !colspan=2|Heat !colspan=2|Final |-style="font-size:95%" !Time !Rank !Time !Rank |- |align=left|Finau Ohuafi Noelani Day Charissa Panuve Amini Fonua |align=left|4×100 m freestyle relay |4:08.19 |34 |colspan=2|Did not advance |- |align=left|Finau Ohuafi Amini Fonua Charissa Panuve Noelani Day |align=left|4×100 m medley relay |4:39.91 |34 |colspan=2|Did not advance |} ==References== Category:Nations at the 2019 World Aquatics Championships Category:Tonga at the World Aquatics Championships Category:2019 in Tongan sport
